sentence.Network_en: Reach out, beauteous Turkey, give me your hand, my beloved homeland!
sentence.Network_cn: 伸出你的手吧, 美丽的土耳其, 握住我的手吧, 亲爱的祖国!

sentence.Network_en: Beauteous white roses are blooming peacefully in the wizard's secret garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 巫师安静的后花园,美丽的白色玫瑰就那样安静的绽开.

sentence.Network_en: It is a beauteous evening, calm and free.
sentence.Network_cn: 美妙的黄昏既安详又自在.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... righteous 正直的 beauteous 美丽的 gaseous 气体的，气态的.
英语词汇词根 - 豆丁网 ... ,pretty 漂亮的, 悦人的 beauteous a. 美的, 美丽的 ,war 战争.

list.abs: beauteous white roses are blooming peacefully in the wizard's secret garden . Someonecould hear the voice of blooming whilst someone might see the sequel officing .巫师安静的后花园，美丽的白色玫瑰就那样安静的绽开，有人能听到她开花的声音，有人也能看到花落的结局…
beautiful dreams are like beauteous lyrics , which can never expect to meet , but often come to you in every unexpected moment .美丽的梦和美丽的诗一样，都是可遇而不可求的，常常在最没能料到的时刻里出现。
Of skies so beauteous after a storm , and at night the moon so unearthly bright ., 风暴之后的晴空多么美丽 , 夜晚的明月多么皎洁.
I am the Spirit of the Great Central Sun of your local Universe , affecting your energies now in glorious and beauteous ways .我是你们的本地宇宙大中枢太阳的灵魂，现在用荣耀和美丽的方式作用你们的能量。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from beauty,on the pattern of bounteous and plenteous

encyclopedia.content: 简介 中文名：媄 Beauteous除皱素就是BOTOX，它是一种非常流行的非手术注射美容法，已在1989年获得美国食品医药厅（FDA）的认可，它可在一定时间内减少甚至消除眉间纹、额纹、鱼尾纹以及厚厚的颈褶。据美国美容整形外科协会(ASAPS)网站调查表明，在美国美容整形手术数量明显增加，其中增加最多的是BOTOX注射去皱术，为142%。这种方法可使肌肤看起来更加光滑、鲜嫩。适用于额头纹、眉间纹、鱼尾纹、阔肌纹等，有效率达100%。 BOTOX

entry.def: Beauteous means the same as beautiful.

example.tran: 美丽的弗洛拉·蒙哥马利小姐

auth_sentence.content: The high moon sails upon her beauteous way.
auth_sentence.res_content: The high moon sails upon her beauteous way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The high moon sails upon her beauteous way.

auth_sentence.content: The interaction between rhythm section and the rest of the group is beauteous to behold.
auth_sentence.res_content: The interaction between rhythm section and the rest of the group is beauteous to behold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The interaction between rhythm section and the rest of the group is beauteous to behold.
